sql.name: maintenanceoperationsdatapage.group
sql.item: select t.groupname from ( select g.c630000018 groupname from {100} g where g.c630000021='2' and g.c630000020='000000000600001' and g.c630000027='1' union all select trim('网管中心') groupname from dual ) t

sql.name: maintenanceoperationsdata.left
maintenanceoperationsdata.colTitle
sql.item: select trim('线路') from dual union all select trim('传输设备') from dual union all select trim('传输连接件') from dual union all select trim('网管系统') from dual union all select trim('电源') from dual union all select trim('调度单的数量') from dual union all select trim('需调度的电路数量') from dual union all select trim('超时调度的单数') from dual union all select trim('超时调度的电路数量') from dual union all select trim('重大故障次数') from dual union all select trim('超时处理故障数量') from dual

sql.name: maintenanceoperationsdata.centervalue
sql.item: select trim('线路'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000013),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('传输设备'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000005),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('传输连接件'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000007),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('网管系统'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000009),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('电源'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000011),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('调度单的数量'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000017),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('需调度的电路数量'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000019),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('超时调度的单数'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000021),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('超时调度的电路数量'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000024),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('重大故障次数'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000033),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('超时处理故障数量(合计)'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000035),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002
